#include<stdio.h>
#include<set>
#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<math.h>
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		ll N;
		scanf("%lld",&N);
		set<ll> visited;
		queue<ll> q;
		q.push(N);
		ll max = 0;
		int first = 0;
		while(!q.empty()){
			ll n = q.front();
			q.pop();
			if(n>max && first==1)max = n;
			first = 1;
			int numDigits = (int)log10(double(n)) + 1;
			//printf("%d\n",numDigits);
			ll mul=1;
			for(int i=1;i<numDigits;i++){
				mul = mul*10;	
			}
				
			ll l = (n%10)*mul + (n/10);
			ll r = (n/mul) + (n%mul)*10;
			//printf("%lld %lld %lld\n",n,l,r);
			if(visited.find(l)==visited.end()){
				q.push(l);
				visited.insert(l);
			}
			if(visited.find(r)==visited.end()){
				q.push(r);
				visited.insert(r);
			}
			
		}
		printf("%lld\n",max);
	}

}
